title: Armenia’s economic growth accelerates to 10.5% in September, World Bank says
description:

title: Armenia's Economic Pulse: Fairer Markets for Inclusive Growth
description:
After two years of exceptional expansion (2022–2023), economic growth in Armenia normalized in 2024 as GDP eased to 5.9% and to 5.6% in H1 2025, with inflation picking up.

The earlier surge—driven by temporary re-exports and capital inflows linked to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine—has been unwinding ...

title: Armenia Holds Key Rate Unchanged at 6.75%
description:
The Central Bank of Armenia kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged at 6.75% during its November 2025 meeting, maintaining the stance from its previous meeting.

Policymakers also maintained the deposit rate at 5.25% and the lending rate at 8.25%.

title: Unemployment rate in Armenia fell to 14% in the first quarter - WB
description:
